column5: Good to meet you and Brook today.  Thanks for the help.   I really didn't think it was as quick & easy as you showed it to be.  I'm Hooked
Heroin is pretty easy to get hooked on....  But seriously what did they help you out with? lol
Ya, thanks Spiel, whatever you did
I suspect that Spiel helped save the life of a troubled rod. I don't think Brook helped though....she hasn't started building rods yet has she?
LOL, yep just a quick tip guide replacement for I'mHooked. Nice to have met you to Craig and thanks for the baits, I hope to put them to good use soon.
Spiel builds rods???? I thought that Brook was the person and Spiel was the dog??? I will need to see which one of them has thumbs to believe that one Roy.   Art

Well I can tell you which one was definitely the better looking one  Yes, the life of a troubled rod was saved. A rod so troubled in fact that it's tip was broken by an overzealous father-in-law who was checkng the action on a BRAND NEW rod that hasn't even had a reel on it yet!
Oh, great, another SPEIL about Spiel......
